model_answer: The answer is A/B/C. The speaker's difficulty in finding dolls and his frustration with the lack of certain items (such as Billy Butcher's head and candy bars) likely led him to give up on finding what he was looking for at the store. The encounter with the creepy doll and the reaction from the supervisor may have also contributed to his frustration and decision to abandon the search.
The answer is B: Event 2 — He goes through the creepy chain-lined passage (visual) and even implores the “chains of death” to scare him (audio), testing whether they’ll frighten him.
